links: James Spahlinger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
D. J. Broadhurst, On the enumeration of irreducible k-fold Euler sums and their roles in knot theory and field theory
maple: b := proc(n) local sum; sum := 0; for d in divisors(n) do sum := sum + mobius(n/d)*(fibonacci(d+1)+fibonacci(d-1)) od; RETURN(sum/n); end; A001461 := proc(n) local i; add(b(i),i=1..n); end;
mathematica: b[n_] := Sum[ MoebiusMu[n/d]*(Fibonacci[d+1] + Fibonacci[d-1]), {d, Divisors[n]}]/n; Accumulate[ Table[ b[n], {n, 1, 35}]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 02 2011 *)
